attributes.action: Resign, because he has sat too long for any good he has been doing. Go, we say, and let us have done with you. In the name of God, go!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Under this Prime Minister's leadership Britain has become a more divided and lawless society. The election promises of 1997 have been broken. He has proved to be, like his Government, all spin and little substance. Go, we say, and let us have done with you.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
